text_block_list.text:
――Summer had arrived. The Uma Musume had gathered at the beach 
during Summer Training Camp to train themselves to the limit.
Haaaaaaaaaa!!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Beneath the scorching sun, Narita Top Road ran. 
She was steadily improving her skills.
Class Rep Top Road! Do your best~~!!
text_block_list.name: Uma Musume Classmates

text_block_list.text:
! 
Yaaaaaaaaaーー!!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
――All of this was to live up to expectations. 
That driving force seemed to have no limit.

Trainer-san, 
today again, thank you for your instructions!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Yeah tomorrow……ah, that's right. 
Trainer-san, do you have any plans for later?
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
I was thinking, as a change of pace, I'd go to the Summer 
Festival nearby! If you'd like, how about going with me?
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Oooohー the sauce smells good! 
Trainer-san, what should we eat first!?
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Okonomiyaki or yakisoba…… Huh? 
The girls over there are……?
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Ah, Class Rep Top Road! 
You came at just the right time!! Please, help us~!!
text_block_list.name: Uma Musume Classmates

text_block_list.text:
Several Uma Musume with dejected looks on their faces 
were gathered in front of a shooting gallery. It seemed 
like they were Narita Top Road's classmates.

We're trying to get that set of fireworks, but noone's able to 
knock them down. We just want to enjoy the fireworks together~~!
text_block_list.name: Classmate A

text_block_list.text:
Class Rep Top Road! 
Can you get revenge for us!?
text_block_list.name: Classmate B

text_block_list.text: Eh!? You want me to do it!?
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
……Those fireworks, the way they're sitting 
you just need to hit the upper right…… But……I'm 
……not so good with that kind of precision……
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: Class Rep, please!!
text_block_list.name: Uma Musume Classmates

text_block_list.text:
――Alright. 
For now, I'll give it a shot!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Aim for the top right…………Take that! 
――Ah, I missed……
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
The next one for sure…………Take that! 
――Uwah, this time it went above…………one more!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: …………dang it. I only have one shot left……
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
(What should I do, everyone's counting on me…… 
I can't just let it end like this……but……!)
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: My eyes met with Narita Top Road's.

Trainer-san! 
Can you give me a few tips on how to shoot!?
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
To start with, I had her put the gun down since 
she was straining so hard. She needed to support 
the gun with not only her arms, but her body.
So I support it with my body. I'll give it a shot!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
choice_data_list: And brace yourself when you fire

text_block_list.text: Got it!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: Right……! Here goes!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: (Pop…… Thump!)

You did it~~~~!! 
Class Rep, thank you~~!!
text_block_list.name: Classmate A

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, yeah! 
You're welcome!!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: ……Ehehe. I'm glad……!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Hey hey, Class Rep, you should join us for the 
fireworks! We'll do it at a place where we can see 
the fireworks, so it'll be double the fireworks!
text_block_list.name: Classmate B

text_block_list.text:
Ah, absolutely! 
Let's go, Trainer-san!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
I acted as chaperone for the Uma Musume as they 
played with the fireworks. From the center of 
that group, Narita Top Road came running over.

Trainer-san, do you want to join in with the fireworks too? 
You were the reason this happened after all!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Just watching…… 
…………
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
……Fufuu, I see. 
Everyone looks like they're having fun, huh!?
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Yeah. ……Trainer-san has always treated everything 
I've found important as important too.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
……Before, at the Amusement Park, 
you said 『Don't hesitate to rely on me』 didn't you?
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
I was a little surprised. I had thought that if it 
was something left to me, I should handle it myself.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
choice_data_list: <size=43>And you end up working way too hard</size>
<size=43>And you end up working way too hard</size>

text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, you're right. Having something left 
to me just makes me so, so happy……that's why 
even if it's difficult, it doesn't bother me.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
But, you helped me realize that there are times 
when doing things alone isn't the best option.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
――It's fine to rely on others. 
It's fine to work on it together!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, 
I want to live up to everyone's expectations.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Will you help me with that? 
……together, from now on!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Fireworks went off overhead. 
The two of us gazed at the lively scene.
